name: John COZZONE, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent

parties: John COZZONE, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of December, 2008, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
961 A.2d 1228
John COZZONE, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent.
No. 138 EM 2008.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 3, 2008.
